author: Sean O'Kane
title: General Motors will make ventilators to help fight the worst cases of COVID-19
description: GM will manufacture ventilators for Ventec Life Systems, with the goal of eventually making 10,000 per month. Trump tweeted that he wanted GM to make the ventilators, despite saying hours earlier on Fox News that he didn’t think they were as necessary.
content:
Trump scolded the company on Friday after downplaying the need for ventilators on Fox News
Photo by Bill Pugliano / Getty Images
General Motors will manufacture ventilators that are crucial to fighting the worst symptoms of COVID-19, the disease caused by t… [+4409 chars]
